data.title: Charles Gurin
data.meta_description: has covered developments in the former Soviet Union for more than a decade and also carried out journalistic assignments in other parts of the world, including Africa and Latin America. He specializes in Russian domestic and foreign policy.
data.text:
Articles by Charles Gurin
